name: Out of Time
description:
Out of Time is a singleplayer escape the room 3D-quest set in steampunk universe.

Your main goal is to escape a secret research facility located out in the sea. The main heroine will have to defuse a bomb before the time runs out. Forced to partake in this deadly race against time she will solve all the puzzles and uncover the truth about the mysterious facility.

Key features:
- Intense story about a girl trapped in a deadly time loop,
- mysterious research facility hidden away from curious eyes,
- neat visuals, unusual puzzles, mysteries and a quirky robo-bartender.

Release date: Q3 2019
